data.title: Thrill Seekers: Past conversation with NBA star Gerald Wallace
data.meta_description: I was very familiar with former NBA star forward Gerald Wallace for quite some time before I sat down with him for this interview in 2005. ...
data.text:
About Me

Anthony "Thrill" Hill

Charlotte, North Carolina, United States

Anthony Hill is the location manager/ partner at TITLE boxing club (Charlotte, NC). He also is a PR specialist at Charlotte Motor Speedway. Hill is also a personal trainer in Charlotte. On top of all of that, Hill corresponds for ESPN Radio and Examiner.com to give insight on Wake Forest athletics. Hill is the former sports editor of The Winston-Salem Chronicle, where he won several regional and national journalism awards during his six years with the weekly publication. In 2008, Hill won a First Place (Merit Award) National Newspaper Publishers Association. Some of his other honors included second place North Carolina Press Association Award in 2003 and third place NC Press Association Award in 2004. He also captured NNPA honors in 2004, 2007 and 2008. Hill is a native of Enterprise, Alabama. Hill is also a member of Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity Inc. Anthony Hill can be reached at ahillscout@gmail.com

View my complete profile
